about_the_game:
What is Slashin' Around?

Slash your way through the dungeons, upgrade your character, buy perks, unlock characters and finish the dungeon!

Slashin'Around is a fast-paced action game inspired by Hack'N'Slash games like Diablo or Path of Exile. You must use a mix of inputs, quick parries and strategic decisions to overcome monsters coming at you.

You are playing short dungeons and intense game sessions where every decision and movement matter for your success in the dungeon.

Dungeons are made of around 10 levels, with scaling difficulty for both the players and the monsters : everyone gets stronger!

Every encounter provides unique choices for the players to improve their run. For instance you may make your attack steal life, or gain gold from attacks.

In a roguelike style, every run is new and unique, with random generations around perks and monsters.

Every character its own play style

Every character has uniques skills, stats and behavior. They help in feeling a new and customized experience for your runs.

-----------------------------------------

Made in solo by Tavrox, with help of asset packs.

Features :

  • Bash, slash, crush monsters with your attacks and skills

  • Upgrade your base stats like attack rate, max HP or health regen

  • Buy powerful perks to improve your looting, defense or attack

  • Fight various monsters with unique effects

  • Block attacks at the right timing to gain an edge on your opponents

  • Select a character with unique attacks and skills

  • Short game sessions while waiting for ranked queue in other online games or for parents

  • 3 environments : Sewers, Cemetery and Old Prison to destroy monsters!
